name: Playful Squares
description: Assignment week one. I did an inspired version of Dialog Between Emotion and Method created by Vera Molnar. This is the first version where I played with randomness and colors

name: Sunny Squares
description: Assignment week one. I did an inspired version of Dialog Between Emotion and Method created by Vera Molnar. This is the second version where I changed the variance, changing the look of the squares. The color palette is inspired by sky and sunset
